mapper.select: SELECT sh_vocdeviceeffi.*,company.company_name,company.county_id,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM sh_vocdeviceeffi LEFT JOIN company ON sh_vocdeviceeffi.factory_id=company.com_id LEFT JOIN county ON company.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID where sh_vocdeviceeffi.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

nox_emission, voc_emission, nh3_emission, co_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission, emission_unit, scccode, source_discrip, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, workshop_section = #{workshopSection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gy_name = #{gyName,jdbcType=CHAR}, exit_airVolume = #{exitAirvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, annual_runtime = #{annualRuntime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, emission_unit = #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = mapper.update:
update sh_vocdeviceeffi
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
factory_id = #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
workshop_section = #{workshopSection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gy_name = #{gyName,jdbcType=CHAR},
exit_airVolume = #{exitAirvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
annual_runtime = #{annualRuntime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
exit_concentration = #{exitConcentration,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
efficency = #{efficency,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
emission_unit = #{emissionUnit,jdbcType=CHAR},
scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
